com.facebook.buck.util

Class CloseableWrapper<T,E extends Exception>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.facebook.buck.util.CloseableWrapper<T,E>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AutoCloseable

    public class CloseableWrapper<T,E extends Exception>
extends Object
implements AutoCloseable
    Convenience wrapper class to attach closeable functionality to non-closeable class so it can be used with try-with-resources to make sure resources are always released and proper exception suppression is used

    Example:

    class Main {

    private static void finalizeMyClass(MyClass obj) throws IOException {

    obj.shutdown();

    }

    public static void main() {

    try (CloseableWrapper myClassWrapper =

    CloseableWrapper.of(new MyClass(), Main::finalizeMyClass)) {

    myClassWrapper.get().doSomething();

    }

    }

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  CloseableWrapper.ThrowingConsumer<T,E extends Exception>
      The version of Consumer<T> that can throw an exception.

      CloseableWrapper<T,E>      		 of(T obj, CloseableWrapper.ThrowingConsumer<T,E> closer)
      Wrap an object with AutoCloseable interface and provide a function to replace a close method The wrapper is idempotent, i.e.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    • Method Detail

      • of

        public static <T,E extends Exception> CloseableWrapper<T,E> of(T obj,
                                                               CloseableWrapper.ThrowingConsumer<T,E> closer)
        Wrap an object with AutoCloseable interface and provide a function to replace a close method The wrapper is idempotent, i.e. it will call closer function exactly once, even if user calls close multiple times.
        Parameters:
        obj - Any class that does not implement AutoCloseable interface which is hard to extend
        closer - A function to call on close

      • get

        public T get()
        Returns:
        Original wrapped object

      • close

        public void close()
           throws E extends Exception
        Specified by:
        close in interface AutoCloseable
        Throws:
        E extends Exception
